    publications

    Light Sterile Neutrinos at uSTORM: Decoherence and CP violation

    Light Sterile Neutrinos at uSTORM: Decoherence and CP violation, Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, proceedings, 2017,

    Neutrino Trident Scattering at Near Detectors

    Neutrino Trident Scattering at Near Detectors, Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Yuber F. Perez-Gonzalez, Zahra Tabrizi, Renata Zukanovich Funchal, JHEP 01 (2019) 119, 2018,

    Testing New Physics Explanations of the MiniBooNE Anomaly at Neutrino Scattering Experiments

    Testing New Physics Explanations of the MiniBooNE Anomaly at Neutrino Scattering Experiments, Carlos A. Argüelles, Matheus Hostert, Yu-Dai Tsai, Phys.Rev.Lett. 123 (2019) 26 261801, 2018,

    Hidden Physics at the Neutrino Frontier: Tridents, Dark Forces, and Hidden Particles

    Hidden Physics at the Neutrino Frontier: Tridents, Dark Forces, and Hidden Particles, Matheus. Hostert, thesis, 2019,

    Neutrino trident production at near detectors

    Neutrino trident production at near detectors, Matheus Hostert, PoS NOW2018 (2019) 037, 2019,

    Z’s in neutrino scattering at DUNE

    Z's in neutrino scattering at DUNE, Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Yuber F. Perez-Gonzalez, Zahra Tabrizi, Renata Zukanovich Funchal, Phys.Rev.D 100 (2019) 5 055012, 2019,

    Dark Neutrinos and a Three Portal Connection to the Standard Model

    Dark Neutrinos and a Three Portal Connection to the Standard Model, Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Phys.Rev.D 101 (2020) 11 115025, 2019,

    Neutrino Masses from a Dark Neutrino Sector below the Electroweak Scale

    Neutrino Masses from a Dark Neutrino Sector below the Electroweak Scale, Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Phys.Rev.D 99 (2019) 9 091701, 2019,

    Pair production of dark particles in meson decays

    Pair production of dark particles in meson decays, Matheus Hostert, Kunio Kaneta, Maxim Pospelov, Phys.Rev.D 102 (2020) 5 055016, 2020,

    A dark seesaw solution to low energy anomalies: MiniBooNE, the muon (g − 2), and BaBar

    A dark seesaw solution to low energy anomalies: MiniBooNE, the muon (g − 2), and BaBar, Asli Abdullahi, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Phys.Lett.B 820 (2021) 136531, 2020,

    Constraints on decaying sterile neutrinos from solar antineutrinos

    Constraints on decaying sterile neutrinos from solar antineutrinos, Matheus Hostert, Maxim Pospelov, Phys.Rev.D 104 (2021) 5 055031, 2020,

    Novel multilepton signatures of dark sectors in light meson decays

    Novel multilepton signatures of dark sectors in light meson decays, Matheus Hostert, Maxim Pospelov, Phys.Rev.D 105 (2022) 1 015017, 2020,

    Heavy neutral leptons below the kaon mass at hodoscopic neutrino detectors

    Heavy neutral leptons below the kaon mass at hodoscopic neutrino detectors, Carlos A. Argüelles, Nicolò Foppiani, Matheus Hostert, Phys.Rev.D 105 (2022) 9 095006, 2021,

    MicroBooNE and the νe Interpretation of the MiniBooNE Low-Energy Excess

    MicroBooNE and the νe Interpretation of the MiniBooNE Low-Energy Excess, C. A. Argüelles, I. Esteban, M. Hostert, Kevin J. Kelly, J. Kopp, P. A. N. Machado, I. Martinez-Soler, Y. F. Perez-Gonzalez, Phys.Rev.Lett. 128 (2022) 24 241802, 2021,

    Dark sectors in neutron-shining-through-a-wall and nuclear absorption signals

    Dark sectors in neutron-shining-through-a-wall and nuclear absorption signals, Matheus Hostert, David McKeen, Maxim Pospelov, Nirmal Raj, preprint, 2022,

    A New Way To Seek Out Dark Neutrino Sectors And To Boldly Explore Multi-Dimensional Parameter Spaces

    A New Way To Seek Out Dark Neutrino Sectors And To Boldly Explore Multi-Dimensional Parameter Spaces, Carlos A. Argüelles, Nicolò Foppiani, Matheus Hostert, preprint, 2022,

    Dipole-Coupled Neutrissimo Explanations of the MiniBooNE Excess Including Constraints from MINERvA Data

    Dipole-Coupled Neutrissimo Explanations of the MiniBooNE Excess Including Constraints from MINERvA Data, Nicholas W. Kamp, Matheus Hostert, Austin Schneider, Stefano Vergani, Carlos A. Argüelles, Janet M. Conrad, Michael H. Shaevitz, Melissa A. Uchida, preprint, 2022,

    DarkNews: a Python-based event generator for heavy neutral lepton production in neutrino-nucleus scattering

    DarkNews: a Python-based event generator for heavy neutral lepton production in neutrino-nucleus scattering, Asli M. Abdullahi, Jaime Hoefken Zink, Matheus Hostert, Daniele Massaro, Silvia Pascoli, preprint, 2022,
